verses.verse: Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to you when you <S%H1272>fled<s%> from your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>"

So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1004>household<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were with him, <S%H5493>"Put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H8432>among<s%> you, and <S%H2891>purify<s%> yourselves, and <S%H2498>change<s%> your <S%H8071>garments;<s%>

and let us <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H6030>answered<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>distress,<s%> and has <S%H1961>been<s%> with me <S%H1870>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> I have <S%H1980>gone.<s%> "

So they <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H3027>had,<s%> and the <S%H5141>rings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in their <S%H241>ears;<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2934>hid<s%> them <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H424>oak<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5973>near<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

As they <S%H5265>journeyed,<s%> there was a <S%H430>great<s%> <S%H2847>terror<s%> upon the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5439>around<s%> them, and they did not <S%H7291>pursue<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3870>Luz<s%> (that is, <S%H1008>Bethel<s%>), <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> he and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were with him.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> El-bethel, <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1540>revealed<s%> Himself to him, when he <S%H1272>fled<s%> from his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

Now <S%H1683>Deborah,<s%> Rebekah's <S%H3243>nurse,<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and she was <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H4480>below<s%> <S%H8478><s%> <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H437>oak;<s%> it was <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> Allon-bacuth.
Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> when he <S%H935>came<s%> from Paddan-aram, and He <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Your <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> You shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> But <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be your <S%H8034>name.<s%>" Thus He <S%H7121>called<s%> him <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> also <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "I am <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty;<s%> Be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply;<s%> A <S%H1471>nation<s%> and a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H1961>come<s%> from you, And <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from you.

"And the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to you, And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> after you."
Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up from him in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> He had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> with him.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5324>set<s%> up a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> He had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> with him, a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> and he <S%H5258>poured<s%> out a <S%H5262>libation<s%> on it; he also <S%H3332>poured<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on it.
So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> with him, <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

Then they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> and when there was <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H3530>some<s%> <S%H3530>distance<s%> <S%H776><s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath,<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> began to <S%H3205>give<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> and she <S%H7185>suffered<s%> <S%H7185>severe<s%> <S%H3205>labor.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when she was in <S%H7185>severe<s%> <S%H3205>labor<s%> that the <S%H3205>midwife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, "Do not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> for <S%H1571>now<s%> <S%H2088><s%> you have [another] <S%H1121>son.<s%>"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about as her <S%H5315>soul<s%> was <S%H3318>departing<s%> (for she <S%H4191>died<s%>), that she <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Ben-oni; but his father <S%H1>called<s%> him <S%H7121>Benjamin.<s%>
So <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> on the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath<s%> (that is, <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%>).
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5324>set<s%> up a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> her <S%H6900>grave;<s%> that is the <S%H4676>pillar<s%> of Rachel's <S%H6900>grave<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
Then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> on and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H1973><s%> the <S%H4029>tower<s%> of <S%H4029>Eder.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about while <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H7931>dwelling<s%> in that <S%H776>land,<s%> that <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> with <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> his father's <S%H6370>concubine;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [of it.] Now there were <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> â€“

the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah:<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> Jacob's first-born, then <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> and <S%H2074>Zebulun;<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel:<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%>
and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> Rachel's <S%H8198>maid:<s%> <S%H1835>Dan<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali;<s%>

and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> Leah's <S%H8198>maid:<s%> <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H836>Asher.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in Paddan-aram.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to his father <S%H1>Isaac<s%> at <S%H3327>Mamre<s%> of Kiriath-arba (that is, <S%H4471>Hebron<s%>), <S%H2275>where<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033>Abraham<s%> and <S%H85>Isaac<s%> had <S%H3327>sojourned.<s%>
Now the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> were one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H1478>breathed<s%> his <S%H1478>last<s%> and <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H9415>people,<s%> an <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H2205>man<s%> of <S%H7649>ripe<s%> <S%H3117>age;<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> him.
